main event: On July 31, 1948, multiple observers reported seeing unidentified objects in the sky over Columbus, Ohio.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses described the objects as resembling large stars at great distances,Objects changed color to gold and hung in the sky,One witness noted the objects seemed to hover and change positions in the sky,Reports indicate that at least six or seven objects were observed in formation,An investigation suggested the possible identification of some sightings as balloons.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects, possibly resembling balloons
witness description: One was a housewife who reported multiple objects; another a teletype operator who witnessed a descending balloon.
